Function.Description: The compress function converts a Byte Vector, String, or Symbol into a much smaller Byte Vector.

Brief.Overview: The compress function uses the extremely fast LZRW1 compression algorithm, by Ross Williams, to convert a Byte Vector, String, or Symbol into a much smaller Byte Vector.
Brief.Usage: Use the compress function to reduce the size of the iput Byte Vector, String or symbol argument.

Argument.Name: input
Argument.Note: Byte Vector, String, or Symbol to be compressed.

Syntax.Return: A Byte Vector that contains compressed version of the input.
